spells.2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock, detect thoughts, hold person

monsters.name: Lazav

traits.name: Elusive
traits.desc: No attack roll has advantage against Lazav unless he is incapacitated.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Lazav fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.desc: Lazav can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid he has seen. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.desc: Unless Lazav is incapacitated, he is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with Lazav only if he allows it.

monsters.name: Master of Cruelties
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Aura of Blood Lust
traits.desc: When any other creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the master, that creature must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw, or it must immediately take the Attack action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.

traits.name: Feed on the Crowd
traits.desc: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the master dies, the master gains 15 temporary hit points and has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The master makes two melee attacks with its spear.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Captivating Presence (Recharge 6)

If the charmed creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Captivating Presence of all masters of cruelties for the next 24 hours.

spells: The master's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17). The master can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Mind Drinker Vampire
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape 13) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

The target must make a 14 Intelligence saving throw, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

spells: The vampire's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.3/day each: charm person, hold person, mirror image, sleep

actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells.3/day each: charm person, detect thoughts, mage armor, sleep, suggestion

When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the specter can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: The specter magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (5d8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.desc: The specter touches one incapacitated creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24. Unless the creature succeeds on a 15 Intelligence saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

traits.desc: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Locus of the Firemind
traits.desc: Niv-Mizzet can maintain {@status concentration} on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain {@status concentration} on spells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Master Chemister
traits.desc: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d4 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (2d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must succeed on a 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d4 + 9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Dracogenius (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

spells: Niv-Mizzet is a 20th-level Izzet spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave, unseen servant

spells.2nd level (3 slots): blur, enlarge/reduce, flaming sphere, hold person, scorching ray

spells.5th level (2 slots): conjure elemental, polymorph, wall of fire, wall of force

spells.8th level (1 slots): control weather, maze, power word stun

monsters.name: Nivix Cyclops
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The cyclops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cyclops makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Spell Vitalization
reactions.desc: Immediately after a creature casts a spell of 1st level or higher within 120 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can move up to twice its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then make one slam attack against a target of its choice.

monsters.name: Obzedat Ghost
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Council of Five
traits.desc: The ghost has a trait based on who it is, as shown below:

traits.name: Enezesku: Enfeebling Ray
traits.desc: Enezesku's Innate Spellcasting trait includes ray of enfeeblement, which he can cast at will.

traits.name: Fautomni: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces Fautomni to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, Fautomni drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Karlov: Unnatural Vigor
traits.desc: When Karlov regains hit points, he has advantage on attack rolls he makes on his next turn.

traits.name: Vuliev: Teleportation
traits.desc: Vuliev's Innate Spellcasting trait includes misty step, which he can cast at will.

traits.name: Xil Xaxosz: Lingering Spite
traits.desc: When Xil Xaxosz is reduced to 0 hit points, his incorporeal form explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 5 feet of him must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.desc: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the ghost fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Convene the Ghost Council
actions.desc: The ghost summons the other four members of the Obzedat. At the start of the ghost's next turn, the other members appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The ghosts each roll initiative when they appear.

legendary_actions.name: Forced Obedience
legendary_actions.desc: A target that all of the Obzedat ghosts can see must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or bow until the end of its next turn. Until this bow ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased.

legendary_actions.name: Indentured Spirits (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Obzedat ghosts conjure 1d6 indentured spirit (described in this chapter) within 60 feet of one of them.

spells: The ghost's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.At will: chill touch (at 5th level, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes)

traits.name: Focus
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the giant can target a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the giant's focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the giant drops to 0 hit points. When the giant makes an attack roll against its focus, it adds a d4 to its attack roll. If the giant attacks a different target while it has a focus, it subtracts a d4 from its attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage. If the Orzhov giant scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Precognitive Mage

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Glimpse the Temporal Flood (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mage targets one creature within 120 feet of it that it can see. The target takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a 14 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Precognitive Insight (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When the mage or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the mage can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

spells: The mage's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Rakdos
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Captivating Presence
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos must make a 25 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

traits.name: Cruel Entertainment
traits.desc: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Rakdos's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Rakdos makes two attacks with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

actions.name: Curtain-Call Scythe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Sadistic Revelry
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of Rakdos that is his ally or is charmed by him must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward the creature closest to it that it can see, provided it isn't already within 5 feet of that creature. It then must make one melee attack against that creature if it is able to do so.

legendary_actions.name: Scythe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Rakdos uses Curtain-Call Scythe.

legendary_actions.name: Touch of Pain (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Rakdos makes a claw attack against one creature within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 25 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can't maintain {@status concentration} on a spell or any other effect that requires {@status concentration}. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: Rakdos's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 25). He can innately cast hellish rebuke (at 5th level) at will, requiring no material components.

monsters.name: Rakdos Lampooner

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The lampooner is a 4th-level Rakdos spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following bard spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery

spells.1st level (4 slots): bane, dissonant whispers, silent image, Tasha's hideous laughter, thunderwave

traits.name: Nimble
traits.desc: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The juggler makes three dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.desc: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fire eater makes two attacks with its bladed chain.

actions.name: Bladed Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spew Flame (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.desc: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole.

actions.name: Barbed Pole
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

monsters.name: Reckoner

traits.name: First Strike
traits.desc: The reckoner has advantage on initiative rolls.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Lightning Backlash (Recharge 5-6)
reactions.desc: When a creature hits the reckoner with an attack, the attacker takes lightning damage equal to half the damage dealt by the attack.

spells: The reckoner is a 5th-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The reckoner has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, light, message, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): guiding bolt, shield, thunderwave, witch bolt

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: In the first round of a combat, the stalker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The stalker can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Ruin Dweller
traits.desc: The stalker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in ruins, and its speed is not reduced in difficult terrain composed of rubble.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The stalker deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stalker makes three attacks with its shortsword.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: {@atk m} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Explosive Tank
traits.desc: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

actions.name: Light Hammer
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Scorchbringer (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Self-Sacrifice
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Shadow Stride
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Lashing Shadows (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Sire of Insanity
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sire must make a 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage for 1 minute on Wisdom and Charisma checks and on Wisdom and Charisma saves. At the start of each of its turns, the sire can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sire has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

spells: The sire's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The sire can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: clairvoyance, crown of madness, major image, suggestion

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The horror can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Maddening Presence
actions.desc: The horror targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the horror, the target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes paralyzed until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the horror's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The skyswimmer can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skyswimmer makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the skyswimmer. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the skyswimmer, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the skyswimmer's turns. If the skyswimmer takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the skyswimmer must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the skyswimmer. If the skyswimmer dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 19 (2d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Formation Tactics
traits.desc: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

monsters.name: Sphinx of Judgment
spells: The sphinx is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, message

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two slam attacks. The first of those attacks that hits deals an extra 18 (4d8) damage if the giant has taken damage since its last turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Thought Spy

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: On each of its turns, the thought spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thought spy makes two melee attacks, or it makes three ranged attacks with its daggers.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The thought spy's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13). The thought spy can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.At will: charm person, disguise self, encode thoughts (see chapter 2)

monsters.name: Trostani

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Trostani fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Trostani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Trostani's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
traits.desc: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

traits.name: Tree Stride
traits.desc: Once on her turn, Trostani can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

actions.name: Touch of Order
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 23 (3d8 + 10) radiant damage, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start of Trostani's next turn.

actions.name: Wrath of Mat'Selesnya (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Each creature in a 30-foot cube on that point must make a 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Harmony
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani makes one melee attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Life
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani bestows 20 temporary hit points on another creature she can see within 120 feet of her.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Order
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani casts dispel magic.

legendary_actions.name: Chorus of the Conclave (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani casts suggestion. This counts as one of her daily uses of the spell.

legendary_actions.name: Awaken Grove Guardians (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani animates one or two trees she can see within 120 feet of her, causing them to uproot themselves and become awakened trees (see the Monster Manual for their stat blocks) for 1 minute or until Trostani uses a bonus action to end the effect. These trees understand Druidic and obey Trostani's spoken commands, but can't speak. If she issues no commands to them, the trees do nothing but follow her and take the Dodge action.

spells: Trostani's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 24). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.3/day each: bless, conjure animals, giant insect, moonbeam, plant growth, spike growth, suggestion

monsters.name: Undercity Medusa

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The medusa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: During the first round of combat, the medusa has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and it deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The medusa makes two claw attacks. It can also use Petrifying Gaze before or after making these attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Gaze
actions.desc: The medusa fixes its gaze on one creature within 60 feet of it that it can see and that can see its eyes. The target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

spells: The medusa's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14). The medusa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.1/day each: expeditious retreat, fog cloud, misty step

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Self-Sacrifice
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

monsters.name: Wurm
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 11

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The wurm deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Earth Tremors
traits.desc: The wurm creates earth tremors as it moves overland or underground. Any creature that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn must succeed on a 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Any structure or object anchored to the ground that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) force damage.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (5d6 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 17 (5d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. If the wurm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wurm must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wurm. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

monsters.name: Zegana

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Zegana can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Zegana fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Zegana has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Prime Speaker's Trident
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the trident emits a thunderous boom. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the prongs of the trident must make a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from Zegana. If the creature is underwater, the damage is increased to 13 (3d8). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

actions.name: Deluge (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Zegana conjures a wave of water that crashes down on an area within 120 feet of her. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. The water spreads out across the ground, extinguishing unprotected flames it comes in contact with, and then vanishes.

legendary_actions.name: Adaptive Skin
legendary_actions.desc: Zegana gains resistance to one damage type of her choice-acid, fire, lightning, or thunder-until the start of her next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Trident
legendary_actions.desc: Zegana makes one melee attack with the Prime Speaker's Trident.

legendary_actions.name: Enlarge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Zegana casts enlarge/reduce on herself, using the enlarge option, without expending a spell slot.

legendary_actions.name: Deluge (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Zegana uses Deluge, if available.

spells: Zegana is a 15th-level Simic spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, druidcraft, ray of frost, shape water

spells.1st level (4 slots): color spray, expeditious retreat, fog cloud, shield

monsters.name: Abjurer Wizard

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abjurer makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Force Blast
actions.desc: Each creature in a 20-foot cube originating from the abjurer must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the abjurer. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

reactions.name: Arcane Ward (Recharge 4-6)
reactions.desc: When the abjurer or a creature it can see within 30 feet of it takes damage, the abjurer magically creates a protective barrier around itself or the other creature. The barrier reduces the damage to the protected creature by 26 (4d10 + 4), to a minimum of 0, and then vanishes.

spells: The abjurer casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: dancing lights, mage hand, message, prestidigitation

spells.2/day each: dispel magic, lightning bolt, mage armor

spells.1/day each: arcane lock, banishment, globe of invulnerability, invisibility, wall of force

monsters.name: Adult Kruthik
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kruthik makes two Stab or Spike attacks.

actions.name: Stab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Adult Oblex
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this distance), passive Perception 14

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Aversion to Fire
traits.desc: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The oblex doesn't require sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oblex makes two pseudopod attacks, and it uses Eat Memories.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Eat Memories
actions.desc:
The oblex targets one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 18 (4d8) psychic damage and become memory drained until it finishes a short or long rest or until it benefits from the greater restoration or heal spell. Constructs, Oozes, Plants, and Undead succeed on the save automatically.
While memory drained, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from its ability checks and attack rolls. Each time the target is memory drained beyond the first, the die size increases by one: the d4 becomes a d6, the d6 becomes a d8, and so on until the die becomes a d20, at which point the target becomes unconscious for 1 hour. The effect then ends.
The oblex learns all the languages a memory-drained target knows and gains all its skill proficiencies.

bonus_actions.name: Sulfurous Impersonation
bonus_actions.desc: The oblex extrudes a piece of itself that assumes the appearance of one Medium or smaller creature whose memories it has stolen. This simulacrum appears, feels, and sounds exactly like the creature it impersonates, though it smells faintly of sulfur. The oblex can impersonate 1d4 + 1 different creatures, each one tethered to its body by a strand of slime that can extend up to 120 feet away. The simulacrum is an extension of the oblex, meaning that the oblex occupies its space and the simulacrum's space simultaneously. The tether is immune to damage, but it is severed if there is no opening at least 1 inch wide between the oblex and the simulacrum. The simulacrum disappears if the tether is severed.

spells: The oblex casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.3/day each: charm person (as 5th-level spell), detect thoughts, hypnotic pattern

monsters.name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
monsters.damage_resistances: lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: Auran, one language of its creator's choice

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes three Flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes one Flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

monsters.name: Alhoon

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alhoon makes two Chilling Grasp or Arcane Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Chilling Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the alhoon regains 14 hit points.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 28 (8d6) force damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Negate Spell (3/Day)
reactions.desc: The alhoon targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it that is casting a spell. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, the spell fails, but any spell slots or charges are not wasted.

spells: The alhoon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: dancing lights, detect magic, detect thoughts, disguise self, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1/day each: dominate monster, globe of invulnerability, invisibility, modify memory, plane shift (self only), wall of force

monsters.name: Alkilith
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Abyssal Rift
traits.desc: If the alkilith surrounds a door, window, or similar opening continuously for 6d6 days, the opening becomes a permanent portal to a random layer of the Abyss.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The alkilith can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the alkilith is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the alkilith move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the alkilith isn't ordinary slime or fungus.

traits.name: Foment Confusion
traits.desc:
Any creature that isn't a demon that starts its turn within 30 feet of the alkilith must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw, or it hears a faint buzzing in its head for a moment and has disadvantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.
If the saving throw against Foment Confusion fails by 5 or more, the creature is instead subjected to the confusion spell for 1 minute (no {@status concentration} required by the alkilith). While under the effect of that confusion, the creature is immune to Foment Confusion.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The alkilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The alkilith can climb difficult surfaces, such as upside down on ceilings, without making an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The alkilith doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alkilith makes three Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) acid damage.

monsters.name: Allip
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The allip can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The allip doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Maddening Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Howling Babble (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Each creature within 30 feet of the allip that can hear it must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage, and it is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned. Constructs and Undead are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Whispers of Compulsion
actions.desc: The allip chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the allip's choice that the allip can see. Constructs and Undead are immune to this effect.

monsters.name: Amnizu
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the amnizu's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The amnizu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The amnizu uses Blinding Rot or Forgetfulness, if available. It also makes two Taskmaster Whip attacks.

actions.name: Taskmaster Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Blinding Rot
actions.desc: The amnizu targets one or two creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and be blinded until the start of the amnizu's next turn.

actions.name: Forgetfulness (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The amnizu targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. That creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 26 (4d12) psychic damage and become stunned for 1 minute. A stunned creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target is stunned for the full minute, it forgets everything it sensed, experienced, and learned during the last 5 hours.

reactions.name: Instinctive Charm
reactions.desc: When a creature within 60 feet of the amnizu makes an attack roll against it, and another creature is within the attack's range, the attacker must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker must target the creature that is closest to it, not including the amnizu or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target. If the saving throw is successful, the attacker is immune to the amnizu's Instinctive Charm for 24 hours.

spells: The amnizu casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 19):

monsters.name: Angry Sorrowsworn
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.desc: The sorrowsworn has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Rising Anger
traits.desc:
If another creature deals damage to the sorrowsworn, the sorrowsworn's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a Hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 (3d12) psychic damage.
On its turn, the sorrowsworn has disadvantage on attack rolls if no other creature has dealt damage to it since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sorrowsworn makes two Hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Annis Hag

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The annis makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crushing Hug
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

spells: The hag casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

spells.3/day each: disguise self (including the form of a Medium Humanoid), Fog cloud

monsters.name: Apprentice Wizard

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.

spells: The apprentice casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12)

spells.1/day each: burning hands, disguise self, mage armor

monsters.name: Archdruid

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archdruid makes three Staff or Wildfire attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Wildfire
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) fire damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the druid's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc:
The archdruid magically transforms into a Beast or an Elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less and can remain in that form for up to 9 hours. The archdruid can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The archdruid reverts to its true form if it dies or falls unconscious. The archdruid can revert to its true form using a bonus action.
While in a new form, the archdruid's stat block is replaced by the stat block of that form, except the archdruid keeps its current hit points, its hit point maximum, this bonus action, its languages and ability to speak, and its Spellcasting action.
The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

spells: The archdruid casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

spells.At will: beast sense, entangle, speak with animals

spells.3/day each: animal messenger, dominate beast, faerie fire, tree stride

spells.1/day each: commune with nature (as an action), mass cure wounds

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archer makes two Shortsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Archer's Eye (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: Immediately after making an attack roll or a damage roll with a ranged weapon, the archer can roll a d10 and add the number rolled to the total.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The armanite makes one Claw attack, one Hooves attack, and one Serrated Tail attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Serrated Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Lance (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line that is 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Astral Dreadnought
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned

traits.name: Antimagic Cone
traits.desc: The dreadnought's eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, it decides which way the cone faces. The cone doesn't function while the eye is closed or while the dreadnought is blinded.

traits.name: Astral Entity
traits.desc: The dreadnought can't leave the Astral Plane, nor can it be banished or otherwise transported out of that plane.

traits.name: Demiplanar Donjon
traits.desc: Anything the dreadnought swallows is transported to a demiplane that can be entered by no other means except a wish spell or the dreadnought's Bite and Donjon Visit. A creature can leave the demiplane only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the plane shift spell. The demiplane resembles a stone cave roughly 1,000 feet in diameter with a ceiling 100 feet high. Like a stomach, it contains the remains of past meals. The dreadnought can't be harmed from within the demiplane. If the dreadnought dies, the demiplane disappears, and everything inside it appears around the dreadnought's corpse. The demiplane is otherwise indestructible.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dreadnought fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Sever Silver Cord
traits.desc: If the dreadnought scores a critical hit against a creature traveling by means of the astral projection spell, the dreadnought can cut the target's silver cord instead of dealing damage.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The dreadnought doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dreadnought makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (5d10 + 9) force damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and this damage reduces it to 0 hit points or it is incapacitated, the dreadnought swallows it. The swallowed target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, appears in an unoccupied space on the floor of the Demiplanar Donjon.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The dreadnought makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Donjon Visit (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: One Huge or smaller creature that the dreadnought can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a 19 Charisma saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space on the floor of the Demiplanar Donjon. At the end of the target's next turn, it reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Projection (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the dreadnought must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw, taking 26 (4d10 + 4) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the aurochs moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone if it is a creature.

monsters.name: Autumn Eladrin

traits.name: Enchanting Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Foster Peace
reactions.desc: If a creature charmed by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.

spells: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.2/day each: cure wounds (as a 5th-level spell), lesser restoration

monsters.name: Babau
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The babau makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting or Weakening Gaze.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Weakening Gaze
actions.desc: The babau targets one creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The babau casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 11):

spells.At will: darkness, dispel magic, fear, heat metal, levitate

monsters.name: Bael
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Dread
traits.desc: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Bael must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of him until the start of its next turn. A creature succeeds on this saving throw automatically if Bael wishes it or if he is incapacitated.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Bael fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Bael have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Bael regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Bael dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Bael makes two Hellish Morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Hellish Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) force damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each of Bael's allies within 60 feet of him can't be charmed or frightened until the end of his next turn.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Bael teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Fiendish Magic
legendary_actions.desc: Bael uses Spellcasting or Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Infernal Command
legendary_actions.desc: Bael uses Infernal Command.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Bael makes one Hellish Morningstar attack.

spells: Bael casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium), charm person, detect magic, invisibility, major image

spells.3/day each: dispel magic, fly, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters.name: Balhannoth
monsters.senses: blindsight 500 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 16

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack against one creature it has grappled.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary_actions.name: Vanish
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth magically becomes invisible for up to 10 minutes or until immediately after it makes an attack roll.

monsters.name: Banderhobb
monsters.languages: understands Common and the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Resonant Connection
traits.desc: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The banderhobb makes one Bite attack and one Tongue attack. It can replace one attack with a use of Shadow Step.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 16) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the banderhobb can't use its Bite attack or Tongue attack on another target.

actions.name: Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the target must make a 16 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the banderhobb.

actions.name: Shadow Step
actions.desc: The banderhobb teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature grappled by the banderhobb. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. The creature is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the banderhobb, and it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the banderhobb's turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stops taking the necrotic damage and becomes stable.
The banderhobb can have only one creature swallowed at a time. While the banderhobb isn't incapacitated, it can regurgitate the creature at any time (no action required) in a space within 5 feet of it. The creature exits prone. If the banderhobb dies, it likewise regurgitates a swallowed creature.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the banderhobb takes the {@action Hide} action.

monsters.name: Baphomet
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Baphomet makes one Bite attack, one Gore attack, and one Heartcleaver attack. He also uses Frightful Presence.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage. If Baphomet moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 25 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

actions.name: Heartcleaver
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc:
Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.
If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Heartcleaver Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet makes one Heartcleaver attack.

legendary_actions.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet moves up to his speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}, then makes a Gore attack.

spells: Baphomet casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 18):

spells.3/day each: dispel magic, dominate beast, maze, wall of stone

monsters.name: Bard

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bard makes two Shortsword or Shortbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Cacophony (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the bard must make a 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the bard. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

bonus_actions.name: Taunt (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The bard targets one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

spells: The bard casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

monsters.name: Barghest
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Goblin, Infernal, telepathy 60 ft.

traits.name: Fire Banishment
traits.desc: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 10 feet high or wide, it must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or be instantly banished to Gehenna

traits.name: Soul Feeding
traits.desc: The barghest can feed on the corpse of a Fey or Humanoid it killed within the past 10 minutes. This feeding takes at least 1 minute, and it destroys the corpse. The victim's soul is trapped in the barghest for 24 hours, after which time it is digested and the person is incapable of being revived. If the barghest dies before the soul is digested, the soul is released. While a soul is trapped in the barghest, any magic that tries to restore the soul to life has a {@chance 50} chance of failing and being wasted.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The barghest makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The barghest transforms into a Small goblin or back into its true form. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The barghest reverts to its true form if it dies.

spells: The barghest casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

spells.At will: levitate, minor illusion, pass without trace

monsters.name: Berbalang

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc:
The berbalang makes one Bite attack and one
Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Spectral Duplicate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
bonus_actions.desc:
The berbalang creates one spectral duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. While the duplicate exists, the berbalang is unconscious. A berbalang can have only one duplicate at a time. The duplicate disappears when it or the berbalang drops to 0 hit points or when the berbalang dismisses it (no action required).
The duplicate has the same statistics and knowledge as the berbalang, and everything experienced by the duplicate is known by the berbalang. All damage dealt by the duplicate's attacks is psychic damage.

spells: The berbalang casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Bheur Hag

traits.name: Control Weather (1/Day)
traits.desc: The hag can cast the control weather spell, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Graystaff Magic
traits.desc: The hag carries a graystaff, a magic staff. The hag can use its flying speed only while astride the staff. If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.desc: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check, and difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost the hag extra moment.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hag makes two Slam or Frost Shard attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Frost Shard
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 30 (6d8 + 3) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hag's next turn.

actions.name: Horrific Feast
actions.desc: The hag feeds on the corpse of one enemy within reach that died within the past minute. Each creature of the hag's choice that is within 60 feet and able to see the feeding must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the hag for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature is incapacitated, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrific Feast for the next 24 hours.

spells: While holding or riding the graystaff, the hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

spells.1/day each: cone of cold, ice storm, wall of ice

monsters.name: Black Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes one Bite attack and two Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the abishai takes the {@action Hide} action.

spells: The abishai casts darkness at a point within 120 feet of it, requiring no spell components or {@status concentration}. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to 60 feet as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Blackguard

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blackguard makes three attacks, using Glaive, Shortbow, or both.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the blackguard for 1 minute.
