monsters.name: Sibriex
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Contamination
traits.desc: The sibriex emits an aura of corruption 30 feet in every direction. Vegetation withers in the aura, and the ground in the aura is difficult terrain for other creatures. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to this sibriex's Contamination for 24 hours.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the sibriex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sibriex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sibriex makes three Chain attacks, and it uses Squirt Bile.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d12 + 7) force damage.

actions.name: Squirt Bile
actions.desc: The sibriex targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 31 (9d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Warp Creature
actions.desc: The sibriex targets up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must make a 20 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, a creature becomes immune to this sibriex's Warp Creature. On a failed save, the target is poisoned, which causes it to also gain 1 level of exhaustion. While poisoned in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. Three successful saves against the poison end it, and ending the poison removes any levels of exhaustion caused by it. Each failed save causes the target to gain another level of exhaustion. Once the target reaches 6 levels of exhaustion, it dies and instantly transforms into a living manes under the sibriex's control. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Spray Bile
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile.

legendary_actions.name: Warp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Warp Creature.

spells: The sibriex casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

traits.name: Fallible Invisibility
traits.desc: The skulk is invisible. This invisibility can be circumvented by three things:

traits.name: Charnel Candles
traits.desc: The skulk appears as a dim, translucent form in the light of a candle made of fat rendered from a corpse whose identity is unknown.

traits.name: Children
traits.desc: Humanoid children, aged 10 and under, can see through this invisibility.

traits.name: Reflective Surfaces
traits.desc: The skulk appears as a drab, smoothskinned biped if its reflection can be seen in a mirror or on another surface.

traits.name: Trackless
traits.desc: The skulk leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Skull Lord
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, stunned, unconscious
monsters.languages: all the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the skull lord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half the damage, the skull lord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided it isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the skull lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Master of the Grave
traits.desc: While within 30 feet of the skull lord, any Undead ally of the skull lord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains 1d6 hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The skull lord doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skull lord makes three Bone Staff or Deathly Ray attacks.

actions.name: Bone Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Deathly Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 27 (5d8 + 5) necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord makes one Bone Staff or Deathly Ray attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord moves up to its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

legendary_actions.name: Summon Undead (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord summons up to five skeleton in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. They remain until destroyed. Undead summoned in this way roll initiative, act in the next available turn, and obey the skull lord. The skull lord can have no more than five Undead summoned by this ability at a time.

spells: The skull, lord casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 18):

monsters.name: Slithering Tracker
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands languages it knew in its previous form but can't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the slithering tracker is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the slithering tracker move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the slithering tracker isn't a puddle.

traits.name: Liquid Form
traits.desc: The slithering tracker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The slithering tracker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Life Leech
actions.desc:
One Large or smaller creature that the slithering tracker can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. In addition, the grappled target takes 16 (3d10) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The slithering tracker can grapple only one target at a time.
While grappling the target, the slithering tracker takes only half any damage dealt to it (rounded down), and the target takes the other half.

bonus_actions.name: Watery Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: If underwater, the slithering tracker takes the {@action Hide} action, and it makes the Dexterity (Stealth) check with advantage.

monsters.name: Spawn of Kyuss
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The spawn of Kyuss regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or a body of running water. If the spawn takes acid, fire, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the spawn's next turn. The spawn is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Worms
traits.desc: If the spawn of Kyuss is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away, and it loses its Burrowing Worm action.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The spawn of Kyuss requires no air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spawn of Kyuss makes two Claw attacks, and it uses Burrowing Worm.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Burrowing Worm
actions.desc: A worm launches from the spawn of Kyuss at one Humanoid that the spawn can see within 10 feet of it. The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a 11 Dexterity saving throw. The worm is a Tiny Undead with AC 6, 1 hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use Burrowing Worm to launch a scraped-off worm at a Humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing 1 piercing damage to it. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage per worm infesting it (maximum of 10d6), and if it drops to 0 hit points, it dies and then rises 10 minutes later as a spawn of Kyuss. If a worm-infested target is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

monsters.name: Spirit Troll
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The troll can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes psychic or force damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Spring Eladrin

traits.name: Joyful Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

traits.name: Aura of Shrieks
traits.desc: Creatures within 20 feet of the grue that aren't Aberrations have disadvantage on saving throws, as well as on attack rolls against creatures other than a star spawn grue.

actions.name: Confounding Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Wisdom saving throw or attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of the grue's next turn.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Hulk
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Psychic Mirror
traits.desc: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hulk makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Reaping Arms (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hulk makes a separate Slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a 17 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Larva Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained

traits.name: Return to Worms
traits.desc: When the mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a swarm of insects in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the mage reforms from it 24 hours later.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mage makes three Slam or Eldritch Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Eldritch Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Plague of Worms (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Each creature other than a star spawn within 10 feet of the mage must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (5d8) necrotic damage and be blinded and restrained by masses of swarming worms. The affected creature takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage at the start of each of the mage's turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Feed on Weakness
reactions.desc: When a creature within 20 feet of the mage fails a saving throw, the mage gains 10 temporary hit points.

legendary_actions.name: Slam
legendary_actions.desc: The mage makes one Slam attack.

legendary_actions.name: Eldritch Bolt (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The mage makes one Eldritch Bolt attack.

legendary_actions.name: Feed (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature restrained by the mage's Plague of Worms takes 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the mage gains 6 temporary hit points.

spells: The mage casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: The mangler has advantage on initiative rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mangler makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flurry of Claws (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mangler makes six Claw attacks. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the mangler takes the {@action Hide} action.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Seer
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Out-Of-Phase Movement
traits.desc:
The seer can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, and its movement doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.
Each creature it moves through takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn.
The seer takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The seer makes two Comet Staff or Psychic Orb attacks.

actions.name: Comet Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Orb
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +11 to hit, range 120 feet, one creature. 27 (5d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Collapse Distance (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The seer warps space around one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is teleported up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the seer can see, and then each creature within 10 feet of the target's original space takes 39 (6d12) psychic damage. On a successful save, the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage and isn't teleported.

reactions.name: Bend Space
reactions.desc: When the seer would be hit by an attack roll, it teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, exchanging positions with another star spawn it can see within 60 feet of it. The other star spawn is hit by the attack instead.

monsters.name: Steel Predator
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17
monsters.languages: understands Modron and the language of its owner but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The steel predator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The steel predator doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The steel predator makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) force damage.

actions.name: Stunning Roar (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The steel predator emits a roar in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage, drops everything it's holding, and is stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

spells: The steel predator casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

spells.3/day each: dimension door (self only), plane shift (self only)

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the stench kow moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Stone Cursed
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Cunning Opportunist
traits.desc: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the stone cursed is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the stone cursed move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the stone cursed isn't a statue.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The stone cursed doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Petrifying Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is restrained until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is petrified for 24 hours.

traits.name: Dreamwalker's Charm
traits.desc: An enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the giant must make a 13 Charisma saving throw, provided that the giant isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the giant. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is immune to this giant's Dreamwalker's Charm for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Greatclub or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Petrifying Touch
actions.desc: The giant touches one Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of it that is charmed by it. The target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes petrified, and the giant can adhere the target to its stony body. greater restoration spells and other magic that can undo petrification have no effect on a petrified creature adhered to the giant unless the giant is dead, in which case the magic works normally, freeing the petrified creature as well as ending the petrified condition on it.

monsters.name: Storm Giant Quintessent
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks, or it uses Wind Javelin twice.

actions.name: Lightning Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 40 (9d6 + 9) lightning damage.

actions.name: Wind Javelin
actions.desc: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin deals 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary_actions.name: Gust
legendary_actions.desc: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around the target, who must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be moved up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary_actions.name: Thunderbolt (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: One with the Storm (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells, or other effects. The giant can't use this ability outside its lair, nor can it use this ability if another creature is using a control weather spell or similar magic to quell the storm.

traits.name: Fearsome Presence
traits.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Swarm of Cranium Rats
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.desc: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to all divination spells.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.desc: The swarm sheds dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increases the illumination to bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguishes the light.

spells: As long as it has more than half of its hit points remaining, the swarm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

monsters.name: Swarm of Rot Grubs
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 7 (2d6) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, the target takes 3 (1d6) poison damage. Whenever the poisoned target takes fire damage, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the poisoned target ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.desc: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swashbuckler makes one Dagger attack and two Rapier attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Lightfooted
bonus_actions.desc: The swashbuckler takes the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Commander
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Turning Defiance
traits.desc: The commander and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn Undead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The commander doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The commander makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Call to Honor (1/Day)
actions.desc: If the commander has taken damage during this combat, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, and 1d4 + 1 sword wraith warrior appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander's turn on the same initiative count.

bonus_actions.name: Martial Fury
bonus_actions.desc: The commander makes one Longsword or Longbow attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit, and attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Warrior
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The warrior doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Martial Fury
bonus_actions.desc: The warrior makes one Battleaxe or Longbow attack, and attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

monsters.name: Tanarukk
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, plus any one language

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tanarukk makes one Bite attack and one Greatsword attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Aggressive
bonus_actions.desc: The tanarukk moves up to its speed toward an enemy that it can see.

reactions.name: Unbridled Fury
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the tanarukk can make one Bite or Greatsword attack with advantage against the attacker.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Thorny Body
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the thorny deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Titivilus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Titivilus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Titivilus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Titivilus regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Titivilus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Ventriloquism
traits.desc: Whenever Titivilus speaks, he can choose a point within 60 feet of him; his voice emanates from that point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Titivilus makes one Silver Sword attack, and he uses Frightful Word.

actions.name: Silver Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage if used with two hands, plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

actions.name: Frightful Word
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the target must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from Titivilus by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the {@action Dash} action. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Titivilus teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

actions.name: Twisting Words
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw or become charmed by Titivilus for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the saving throw if Titivilus deals any damage to it. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Titivilus's Twisting Words for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Corrupting Guidance
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses Twisting Words. Alternatively, he targets one creature charmed by him that is within 60 feet of him; that charmed target must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw, or Titivilus decides how the target acts during its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus makes one Silver Sword attack, or he uses Frightful Word.

spells: Titivilus casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

spells.At will: alter self, major image, nondetection, sending, suggestion

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tlincalli makes one Longsword or Spiked Chain attack and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Spiked Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 11) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands in melee.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

monsters.name: Tortle Druid

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tortle makes four Claw attacks or two Nature's Wrath attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Nature's Wrath
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) damage of a type chosen by the tortle: cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

spells: The tortle casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

spells.2/day each: cure wounds, hold person, speak with animals, thunderwave

monsters.name: Transmuter Wizard

traits.name: Transmuter's Stone
traits.desc: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted. The stone grants it one of the following benefits while bearing the stone; the transmuter chooses the benefit at the end of each long rest:

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: The transmuter has {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet.

traits.name: Resilience
traits.desc: The transmuter has proficiency in Constitution saving throws.

traits.name: Resistance
traits.desc: Resistance. The transmuter has resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (transmuter's choice whenever choosing this benefit).

traits.name: Speed
traits.desc: The transmuter's walking speed is increased by 10 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The transmuter makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) acid damage.

bonus_actions.name: Transmute (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The transmuter casts alter self or changes the benefit of Transmuter's Stone if bearing the stone.

spells: The transmuter casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

spells.2/day each: fireball, hold person, knock, mage armor, polymorph, slow

monsters.name: Trapper
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 11

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the trapper is motionless on a floor, wall, or ceiling at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the trapper move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the trapper isn't part of the floor, wall, or ceiling.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The trapper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Smother
actions.desc: One Large or smaller creature within 10 feet of the trapper must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 14). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. While grappled in this way, the target is restrained, blinded, and deprived of air. The trapper can smother only one creature at a time.

monsters.name: Ulitharid

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.desc: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ulitharid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psionic Hub
traits.desc: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. If the ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 27 (4d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape 14) and must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated Humanoid grappled by the ulitharid. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 (4d12 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The ulitharid casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

spells.1/day each: dominate monster, feeblemind, mass suggestion, plane shift (self only), project image, scrying, telekinesis

monsters.name: Vampiric Mist
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, lightning, necrotic, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Life Sense
traits.desc: The mist can sense the location of any creature within 60 feet of it, unless that creature's type is Construct or Undead.

traits.name: Forbiddance
traits.desc: The mist can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

traits.name: Misty Form
traits.desc: The mist can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can pass through it without squeezing. Each foot of movement in water costs it 2 extra feet, rather than 1 extra foot. The mist can't manipulate objects in any way that requires fingers or manual dexterity.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.desc: The mist takes 10 radiant damage whenever it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, the mist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The mist doesn't require air or sleep.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: The mist touches one creature in its space. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw (Undead and Constructs automatically succeed), or it takes 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage, the mist regains 10 hit points, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

monsters.name: Vargouille
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Infernal, and any languages it knew before becoming a vargouille but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Abyssal Curse
actions.desc: The vargouille targets one incapacitated Humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed. The cursed target loses 1 point of Charisma after each hour, as its head takes on fiendish aspects. The curse doesn't advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell; don't count that time. When the cursed target's Charisma becomes 2, it dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille. Casting remove curse, greater restoration, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

actions.name: Stunning Shriek (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The vargouille shrieks. Each Humanoid and Beast within 30 feet of the vargouille and able to hear it must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the vargouille until the end of the vargouille's next turn. While frightened in this way, a target is stunned. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the Stunning Shriek of all vargouilles for 1 hour.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vegepygmy regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vegepygmy regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vegepygmy makes two Claw attacks or two melee Spear attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Spores (1/Day)
actions.desc: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vegepygmy. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area that isn't a Plant must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 9 (2d8) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The velociraptor makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Poison Splash
traits.desc: When the troll takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the troll takes 9 (2d8) poison damage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage, and the creature is poisoned until the start of the troll's next turn.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Venom Spray (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The troll slices itself with a claw, releasing a spray of poison in a 15-foot cube. The troll takes 7 (2d6) slashing damage (this damage can't be reduced in any way). Each creature in the area must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: War Priest

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The war priest makes two Maul attacks, and it uses Holy Fire.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage  plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Holy Fire
actions.desc: The war priest targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) radiant damage, and it is blinded until the start of the war priest's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

bonus_actions.name: Healing Light (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The war priest or one creature of its choice within 60 feet of it regains 12 (2d8 + 3) hit points.

spells: The war priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.1/day each: banishment, command, dispel magic, flame strike, guardian of faith, hold person, lesser restoration, revivify

monsters.name: Warlock of the Archfey

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warlock makes two Rapier attacks, or it uses Bewildering Word twice.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

actions.name: Bewildering Word
actions.desc: The warlock utters a magical bewilderment, targeting one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or take 9 (2d8) psychic damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the warlock's next turn.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the warlock turns invisible and teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

spells: The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

spells.At will: dancing lights, disguise self, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, speak with animals

spells.1/day each: charm person, dimension door, hold monster

monsters.name: Warlock of the Fiend
monsters.languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

traits.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warlock makes three Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Hellfire
actions.desc: Green flame explodes in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of the warlock. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) fire damage and 11 (2d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reactions.name: Fiendish Rebuke (3/Day)
reactions.desc: In response to being damaged by a visible creature within 60 feet of it, the warlock forces that creature to make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.At will: alter self, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation

monsters: Warlock of the Great Old One

monsters.name: Warlock of the Great Old One

traits.name: Whispering Aura
traits.desc: At the start of each of the warlock's turns, each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warlock makes two Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Howling Void
actions.desc: The warlock opens a momentary extraplanar rift within 60 feet of it. The rift is a scream-filled, 20-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and is frightened of the warlock until the start of the warlock's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.

spells: The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.At will: detect magic, guidance, levitate, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation

spells.1/day each: arcane gate, detect thoughts, true seeing

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.desc: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

traits.name: Survivor
traits.desc: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has fewer than half its hit points but at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warlord makes two Greatsword or Short bow attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Command Ally
legendary_actions.desc: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Weapon Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The warlord makes one Greatsword or Shortbow attack.

legendary_actions.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The warlord targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord's next turn.

monsters.name: Wastrilith
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The wastrilith can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Corrupt Water
traits.desc:
At the start of each of the wastrilith's turns, exposed water within 30 feet of it is befouled. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away. Water in containers remains corrupted until it evaporates.
A creature that consumes this foul water or swims in it must make a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the foul water for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of this time, the poisoned creature must repeat the saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned until it finishes a long rest.
If another demon drinks the foul water as an action, it gains 11 (2d10) temporary hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The wastrilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wastrilith makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, and it uses Grasping Spout.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Grasping Spout
actions.desc: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 17 Strength saving throw, and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. On a failed save, it takes 22 (4d8 + 4) acid damage and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the wastrilith. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

bonus_actions.name: Undertow
bonus_actions.desc: If the wastrilith is underwater, it causes all water within 60 feet of it to be difficult terrain for other creatures until the start of its next turn.

monsters.name: Water Elemental Myrmidon
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: Aquan, one language of its creator's choice

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes three Trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) force damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Freezing Strikes (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

monsters.name: White Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Longsword attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Vicious Reprisal
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes one Bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

monsters.name: Winter Eladrin

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sorrowful Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Frigid Rebuke
reactions.desc: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 60 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 11 (2d10) cold damage.

spells: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: fog cloud, gust of wind, sleet storm

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The wood woad has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The wood woad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in contact with the ground. If the wood woad takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wood woad's next turn. The wood woad dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Tree Stride
traits.desc: Once on each of its turns, the wood woad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of it that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wood woad makes two Club attacks.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (4d4 + 4) force damage.

monsters.name: Wretched Sorrowsworn
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Wretched Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The sorrowsworn has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sorrowsworn's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated. The sorrowsworn otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage, and the sorrowsworn attaches to the target. While attached, the sorrowsworn can't attack, and at the start of each of the sorrowsworn's turns, the target takes 6 (1d10 + 1) necrotic damage.
The attached sorrowsworn moves with the target whenever the target moves, requiring none of the sorrowsworn's movement. The sorrowsworn can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement on its turn. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the sorrowsworn.

traits.name: Raxivort's Tongue
traits.desc: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bat.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target, the xvart can push the target 5 feet if the target is a Medium or smaller creature.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Low Cunning
bonus_actions.desc: The xvart takes the {@action Disengage} action.

monsters.name: Xvart Warlock of Raxivort

traits.name: Raxivort's Blessing
traits.desc: When the xvart reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the xvart gains 4 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Raxivort's Tongue
traits.desc: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The xvart makes two Scimitar or Raxivort's Bite attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Raxivort's Bite
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +3 to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. 7 (1d10 + 2) poison damage.

bonus_actions.name: Low Cunning
bonus_actions.desc: The xvart takes the {@action Disengage} action.

spells: The xvart casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 11):

spells.At will: detect magic, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation

monsters.name: Yagnoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yagnoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yagnoloth makes one Electrified Touch attack and one Massive Arm attack, or it makes one Massive Arm attack and uses Battlefield Cunning, if available, or Teleport.

actions.name: Electrified Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Massive Arm
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (3d12 + 4) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or become stunned until the end of the yagnoloth's next turn.

actions.name: Battlefield Cunning (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Up to two allied yugoloths within 60 feet of the yagnoloth that can hear it can use their reactions to make one melee attack each.

actions.name: Life Leech
actions.desc: The yagnoloth touches one incapacitated creature within 15 feet of it. The target takes 36 (7d8 + 4) necrotic damage, and the yagnoloth gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. The target must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest, and the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The yagnoloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The yagnoloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), suggestion

monsters.name: Yeenoghu
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Yeenoghu makes three Flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 22 (2d12 + 9) force damage. If it's his turn, Yeenoghu can cause the target to suffer one of the following additional effects, each of which he can apply only once per turn

actions.name: Confusion
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the confusion spell until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.

actions.name: Force
actions.desc: The target takes an extra 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Paralysis
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) acid damage.

bonus_actions.name: Rampage
bonus_actions.desc: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack, he moves up to half his speed and makes one Bite attack.

legendary_actions.name: Charge
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.

legendary_actions.name: Swat Away
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu makes one Flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Savage (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu makes a separate Bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.

spells: Yeenoghu casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

monsters.name: Yeth Hound
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Sunlight Banishment
traits.desc: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage if the target is frightened.

actions.name: Baleful Baying
actions.desc: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear it must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the hound until the end of the hound's next turn or until the hound is incapacitated. A frightened target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Young Kruthik
monsters.senses: darkvision 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2½-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Stab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Anathema
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 21

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Ophidiophobia Aura
traits.desc: Any creature of the anathema's choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of snakes and yuan-ti. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this anathama's aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Six Heads
traits.desc: The anathema has advantage on saves against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack (Anathema Form Only)
actions.desc: The anathema makes two Claw attacks and one Flurry of Bites attack.

actions.name: Claw (Anathema Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Flurry of Bites (Anathema Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 27 (6d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict (Snake Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and the target is grappled (escape 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and it takes 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. The anathema can constrict only one creature at a time.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The anathema transforms into a Huge constrictor snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

spells: The anathema casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the broodguard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The broodguard makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Mind Whisperer

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the yuan-ti's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sseth's Blessing
traits.desc: When the yuan-ti reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the yuan-ti gains 9 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two Bite attacks and one Scimitar attack, or it makes two Spectral Fangs attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spectral Fangs
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 16 (3d8 + 3) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The yuan-ti transforms into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. If it dies, it stays in its current form.

spells: The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

spells.At will: animal friendship (snakes only), message, minor illusion, prestidigitation

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Nightmare Speaker

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the yuan-ti's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
