monsters.name: Crystal Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 60 ft.
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Scintillating Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 5 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Crystal Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft. (hover), swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to 60 feet in any direction, but not beyond 120 feet of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the greatwyrm is reduced to 0 hit points or uses a bonus action to end it.

bonus_actions.name: Psychic Step
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm emits a beam of psychic energy in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Intelligence saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attack):

spells.1/day each: dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

monsters.name: Deep Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 90 ft., passive Perception 13

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a cloud of spores in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage, and it is frightened of the dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.desc:
The dracohydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the dracohydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.
Whenever the dracohydra takes 30 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the dracohydra dies.
At the end of its turn, the dracohydra grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken radiant damage since its last turn. The dracohydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown this way.

traits.name: Reactive Heads
traits.desc: For each head the dracohydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.desc: While the dracohydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dracohydra makes as many Bite attacks as it has heads.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) damage of a type chosen by the dracohydra: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

actions.name: Prismatic Breath (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The dracohydra's heads exhale a single breath of multicolored energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 33 (6d10) damage of a type chosen by the dracohydra: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it bursts into flames and is reduced to ashes. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the draconian must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Serrated Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Shape Theft
reactions.desc: After the draconian kills a Medium or smaller Humanoid, the draconian can magically transform itself to look and feel like that creature while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation lasts until the draconian dies or uses an action to end it.

traits.name: Controlled Fall
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body turns to stone and releases a petrifying gas. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends; otherwise the creature is petrified for 1 minute. After 1 minute, the body of the draconian crumbles to dust.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into a puddle of acid and splashes acid on those around it. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a 12 Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: Glide
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Dagger attacks. If both attacks hit the same creature, the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of the target's next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

monsters.name: Draconian Mage

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its scales and flesh immediately shrivel away and its bones explode. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) force damage.

traits.name: Glide
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Trident or Necrotic Ray attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Necrotic Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

spells: The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

monsters.name: Draconian Mastermind

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of lightning at the closest creature within 30 feet of it before arcing out to up to two other creatures within 15 feet of the first. Each creature must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes three Rend or Energy Ray attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Energy Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Noxious Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The draconian exhales a 15-foot cone of noxious gas. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, doesn't gain exhaustion, and is immune to all draconians' Noxious Breath for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Magic Shield (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When the draconian is hit by an attack roll, it can create an invisible barrier of magical force around itself, granting it a +5 bonus to its AC against that attack and potentially causing the attack to miss.

spells: The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

monsters.name: Draconic Shard
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 26

traits.name: Deflection
traits.desc: The shard's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The shard can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it takes 5 (1d10) force damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the shard fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: When it drops to 0 hit points, the shard disappears and leaves a Tiny cracked gemstone in its space. The gemstone matches the kind of gem dragon it was in life and has AC 20, 15 hit points, and immunity to all damage except force. Unless the gemstone is destroyed, after 1d20 days, the gemstone dissipates and the shard re-forms, regaining all its hit points and appearing in the place the gemstone once occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The shard doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shard makes two Telekinetic Rend attacks.

actions.name: Telekinetic Rend
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +12 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) force damage.

actions.name: Inhabit Object
actions.desc:
The shard disappears as it pours its psychic essence into a Medium or smaller nonsentient object it can see within 30 feet of it, magically possessing it. The object uses the shard's AC, and any damage dealt to the object applies to the shard's hit points. The shard inhabits the object until it uses an action to leave; until it is turned; until it is reduced to 0 hit points; or until an effect that ends possession, such as a dispel evil and good spell, is used on it. When it leaves the object, it reappears in the nearest unoccupied space.
While inhabited, the object becomes a magic item if it wasn't already, and a Tiny cracked gemstone matching the kind of gem dragon the shard was in life appears somewhere on the object. The shard can cause the object to fly using the shard's own flying speed, use its senses, speak verbally or telepathically, cast spells, and use its legendary actions.
If a creature wears or carries the inhabited object, the shard can grant the creature the following benefits:
Each of the creature's attacks deals an extra 1d8 force damage on a hit.
The creature gains resistance to psychic damage.

actions.name: Psychic Crush (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The shard unleashes a pulse of psychic power. Each creature of the shard's choice in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on it must make a 20 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 55 (10d10) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

legendary_actions.name: Rend
legendary_actions.desc: The shard makes one Telekinetic Rend attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The shard uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Commanding Thought (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The shard targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the end of its next turn. While charmed in this way, the target becomes the shard's puppet, acting and moving in accordance with its telepathic commands. While under the shard's control, the target can take only the Attack (shard chooses the target) or Dash action on its turn.

spells: The shard casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 20):

monsters.name: Draconic Spirit
monsters.ac: 14 + the level of the spell (natural armor)
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison (Chromatic and Metallic Only), force, necrotic, psychic, radiant, thunder (Gem Only)
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12
monsters.languages: Draconic, understands the languages you speak

traits.name: Shared Resistances
traits.desc: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half the spell's level (rounded down), and it uses Breath Weapon.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 1d6 + 4 + summonSpellLevel piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon
actions.desc: The dragon exhales destructive energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes 2d6 damage of a type this dragon has resistance to (your choice) on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Dragon Blessed
monsters.languages: Common, Draconic, and any two languages

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blessed makes two Mace or Radiant Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 22 (5d8) radiant damage, and the blessed regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

spells: The blessed casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

spells.1/day each: enhance ability, flame strike, mass cure wounds, revivify, tongues

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chosen makes one Handaxe attack and two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. Hit or Miss: The handaxe magically returns to the chosen's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Biting Rebuke
reactions.desc: Immediately after the chosen takes damage from a creature within 5 feet of it, it can make a Shortsword attack with advantage against that creature.

monsters.name: Dragon Speaker
monsters.languages: Common, Draconic, and any two languages

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The speaker makes two Thunder Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Thunder Bolt
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 13 (3d8) thunder damage, and the target is pushed horizontally up to 10 feet away from the speaker.

reactions.name: Disarming Words (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When a creature the speaker can see within 60 feet of it makes a damage roll, the speaker can roll a d6 and subtract the number rolled from that damage roll.

spells: The speaker casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

spells.1/day each: calm emotions, charm person, command, comprehend languages

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

monsters.name: Dragonblood Ooze
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, prone, restrained
monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14
monsters.languages: understands Draconic and the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ooze makes two Pseudopod attacks. The ooze can replace one Pseudopod attack with its Slime Breath, if available.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 15). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Slime Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The ooze expels a spray of its gelatinous mass in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) acid damage and is pulled up to 30 feet straight toward the ooze. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

monsters.name: Dragonbone Golem
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands Draconic and the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.desc: Each creature of the golem's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the golem must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw unless the golem is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this golem's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes one Pinion attack and two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Pinion
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is pinned beneath the bony pinion and restrained. The golem has two pinions, each of which can restrain one target. If a creature is restrained by one of the pinions, the golem can't attack with it. Any creature restrained by a pinion can free itself at the start of its turn with a successful 17 Strength (Athletics) check.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The golem emits a 60-foot cone of petrifying gas from its mouth. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) poison damage and be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends on the target. On a failed save, the target is petrified.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragonborn makes three Longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage. The dragonborn can cause the sword to flare with bright light, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the dragonborn's next turn. The sword can flare in this way only once per turn.

actions.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
actions.desc: The dragonborn touches another creature within 5 feet of it. The target magically regains 40 hit points. In addition, all diseases and poisons affecting the target are removed.

actions.name: Radiant Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The dragonborn exhales fiery radiance in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. When the dragonborn uses this action, it can choose up to three creatures in the cone. These creatures take no damage from the radiance and instead regain 22 (4d10) hit points each.

monsters.name: Dragonborn of Sardior

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mental Defense
traits.desc: While the dragonborn is wearing no armor, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragonborn makes three Mind Blade attacks.

actions.name: Mind Blade
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Heat Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The dragonborn exhales a wave of intense heat in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Metal objects in that area glow red-hot until the end of the dragonborn's next turn. Any creature in physical contact with a heated object at the start of its turn must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) fire damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

spells: The dragonborn casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks):

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragonborn makes two Greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The dragonborn exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage and is frightened of the dragonborn for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Dragonflesh Abomination
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Cloying Miasma
traits.desc: The abomination is surrounded by a noxious stench. At the start of the abomination's turn, any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the abomination's next turn.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The abomination regains 10 hit points at the start of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abomination makes three attacks using Claw, Acidic Spit, or a combination of them. It can replace one of the attacks with a Tail attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Acidic Spit
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Belch (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The abomination belches forth a cloud of acidic gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The grafter makes one Claw attack and one Greatclub attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Acid Retch (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The grafter retches forth a spray of acidic bile in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Dragonnel
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13
monsters.languages: understands Draconic and Common but can't speak

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The dragonnel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Drake Companion
monsters.damage_immunities: determined by the drake's draconic essence trait

traits.name: Draconic Essence
traits.desc: When you summon the drake, choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The chosen type determines the drake's damage immunity and the damage of its Infused Strikes trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 plus PB piercing damage.

reactions.name: Infused Strikes
reactions.desc: When another creature within 30 feet of the drake that it can see hits a target with a weapon attack, the drake infuses the strike with its essence, causing the target to take an extra 1d6 damage of the type determined by its Draconic Essence.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The egg hunter can breathe air and water.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the egg hunter is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the egg hunter move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the egg hunter is animate. Dragons have disadvantage on this check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The egg hunter makes two Barbed Proboscis attacks, and it can use Torpor Spores if it's available.

actions.name: Barbed Proboscis
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the egg hunter regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

actions.name: Torpor Spores (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The egg hunter releases a billow of sparkling blue spores. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the egg hunter must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both, and it can't take reactions. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this egg hunter's Torpor Spores for the next 24 hours.

reactions.name: Rapid Adaptation
reactions.desc: When the egg hunter takes damage, it gives itself resistance to that damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The egg hunter can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The egg hunter makes two Egg Tooth attacks.

actions.name: Egg Tooth
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 17 (4d6 + 3) piercing damage if the target is an object.

bonus_actions.name: Rapid Movement
bonus_actions.desc: The egg hunter takes the Dash or Disengage action.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The dragon doesn't require air or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack, two Claw attacks, and one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (1d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 12 (1d8 + 8) psychic damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it is grappled (escape 18). The dragon can have up to four targets grappled at a time.

actions.name: Tadpole Brine Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The dragon exhales brine in a 120-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 22 Constitution saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, if the creature isn't a Construct or an Undead, it becomes infested with illithid tadpoles.
While infested, the creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself after it succeeds on three of these saves. If the creature is targeted by magic that ends a curse or restores 40 hit points or more, the tadpoles infesting the creature are killed instantly, ending the effect on the creature.
If a Humanoid is reduced to 0 hit points while infested, the creature is stable but remains unconscious for 6d12 hours. When the period of unconsciousness ends, the creature transforms into a mind flayer (see the Monster Manual) with all its hit points. Casting a wish spell on the unconscious creature rids it of the infestation and prevents it from turning into a mind flayer.

legendary_actions.name: Tentacle
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes one Tentacle attack.

legendary_actions.name: Shatter Concentration (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon targets a creature it is grappling. The target's {@status concentration} on a spell it has cast or an ability it is maintaining ends, and the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Emerald Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Disorienting Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a wave of psychic dissonance in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 17 (5d6) psychic damage, and until the end of its next turn, when the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, it must roll a d4 and reduce the total by the number rolled. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

spells.At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible), minor illusion

monsters.name: Emerald Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft. (hover), swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to 60 feet in any direction, but not beyond 120 feet of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the greatwyrm is reduced to 0 hit points or uses a bonus action to end it.

bonus_actions.name: Psychic Step
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm emits a beam of psychic energy in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Intelligence saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attack):

spells.1/day each: dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The eyedrake doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Antimagic Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The eyedrake emits a magic wave in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 39 (6d12) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Every spell of 3rd level or lower ends on creatures and objects of the eyedrake's choice in that area.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.desc: The eyedrake shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), each ray targeting one creature it can see within 60 feet of it:

actions.name: 1: Freezing Ray
actions.desc: The target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 17 (5d6) cold damage, and its speed is halved until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

actions.name: 2: Debilitating Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or take 7 (2d6) thunder damage and become incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: 3: Repulsion Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or take 14 (4d6) force damage and be pushed up to 60 feet away from the eyedrake.

actions.name: 4: Fire Ray
actions.desc: The target must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 5: Paralyzing Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 6: Death Ray
actions.desc: The target must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

monsters.name: Gem Stalker
monsters.languages: telepathy 60 ft. understands Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The gem stalker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The gem stalker doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gem stalker makes four Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Crystal Dart
bonus_actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage, and one of the following effects occurs, determined by the kind of dragon that created the gem stalker:

bonus_actions.name: Amethyst
bonus_actions.desc: The gem stalker can teleport to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

bonus_actions.name: Crystal
bonus_actions.desc: The gem stalker gains a number of temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

bonus_actions.name: Emerald
bonus_actions.desc: The target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the next attack roll it makes before the start of the gem stalker's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Sapphire
bonus_actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed horizontally up to 10 feet away from the gem stalker and be knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Topaz
bonus_actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the gem stalker's next turn.

reactions.name: Protective Link
reactions.desc: When another creature the gem stalker can see within 30 feet of it is about to take damage, the gem stalker reduces that damage by 10 (3d6). The gem stalker then takes damage equal to that amount.

monsters.name: Ghost Dragon
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 24

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost dragon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the ghost dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The ghost dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ghost dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 32 (6d8 + 5) cold damage, and the target's speed is halved until the start of the dragon's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Terrifying Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
The ghost dragon exhales shadowy mist in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 40 (9d8) cold damage and is frightened of the ghost dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.
While frightened of the ghost dragon, a creature is paralyzed. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this ghost dragon's Terrifying Breath for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Peck
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Gold Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Metallic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 450 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 120,000 XP (240,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Metallic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Elemental Breath
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales elemental energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 84 (13d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Sapping Breath
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales gas in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls unconscious for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of the greatwyrm's next turn. An unconscious creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points or uses its action to end it.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

mythic_actions.desc: If the greatwyrm's Metallic Awakening trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Bite
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack.

mythic_actions.name: Shattering Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm unleashes a magical roar. Each creature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on the greatwyrm must succeed on a 26 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) thunder damage and be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Green Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Chromatic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales a blast of energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 78 (12d12) poison damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Arcane Spear (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm creates four spears of magical force. Each spear hits a creature of the greatwyrm's choice it can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 12 (1d8 + 8) force damage to its target, then disappears.

mythic_actions.desc: If the greatwyrm's Chromatic Awakening trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Bite
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack.

mythic_actions.name: Chromatic Flare (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm flares with elemental energy. Each creature in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on the greatwyrm must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (5d8) poison damage.

traits.name: False Appearance (Hoard Form Only)
traits.desc: If the mimic is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the mimic move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the mimic is animate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mimic makes one Bite attack and two Pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the mimic adheres to the target. A creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

actions.name: Caustic Mist (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mimic sprays a fine mist of acid in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 (6d8) acid damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

actions.name: Shapechanger
actions.desc: The mimic transforms into a hoard or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

monsters.name: Hoard Scarab
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 9

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the scarab is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the scarab move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the scarab is animate.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Scale Dust (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The scarab releases magical glittering dust from its wings. Each creature within 5 feet of the scarab must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in blue light for 10 minutes. While outlined in this way, a creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from being invisible. In addition, every Dragon within 1 mile of the creature becomes aware of it and can unerringly track the creature. Casting dispel magic on the creature ends the effect on it.

monsters.name: Hollow Dragon
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 23

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the hollow dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Reconstruction
traits.desc: When the hollow dragon is reduced to 0 hit points, its body breaks into nine pieces: two arms, two legs, two wings, a tail, a torso, and a head. Each piece is a Large object with AC 19, 27 hit points, and immunity to psychic and poison damage. After 1d6 days, if all pieces are still within 6 miles of each other, they all teleport to the location of the head piece and merge with it, whereupon the hollow dragon regains all its hit points and becomes active again.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hollow dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, and it can use Sapping Presence.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sapping Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the hollow dragon's choice within 60 feet of it must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this hollow dragon's Sapping Presence for 24 hours.

actions.name: Radiant Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hollow dragon exhales radiant flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The hollow dragon makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Ghostly Binding (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The hollow dragon creates ethereal bindings around a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 19 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Booming Scales (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from the hollow dragon's frame. Each creature within 10 feet of the hollow dragon must make a 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The liondrake makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Blood-Chilling Roar (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The liondrake lets out a terrifying roar audible out to 300 feet. Any creature within 30 feet of the liondrake that can hear its roar must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the liondrake for 1 minute. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is also paralyzed for the same duration. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this liondrake's Blood-Chilling Roar for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Metallic Peacekeeper
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The peacekeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the peacekeeper is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The peacekeeper makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Calming Mist (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The peacekeeper releases a calming gas in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or become charmed by the peacekeeper for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0.

monsters.name: Metallic Warbler
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form

monsters.name: Sapphire Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 60 ft.
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Debilitating Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Sapphire Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft. (hover), swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. traits.name: Unusual Nature

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to 60 feet in any direction, but not beyond 120 feet of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the greatwyrm is reduced to 0 hit points or uses a bonus action to end it.

bonus_actions.name: Psychic Step
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm emits a beam of psychic energy in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Intelligence saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm emits a beam of psychic energy in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Intelligence saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attack):

spells.1/day each: dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

monsters.name: White Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Chromatic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales a blast of energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 78 (12d12) cold damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Arcane Spear (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm creates four spears of magical force. Each spear hits a creature of the greatwyrm's choice it can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 12 (1d8 + 8) force damage to its target, then disappears.

mythic_actions.desc: If the greatwyrm's Chromatic Awakening trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Bite
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack.

mythic_actions.name: Chromatic Flare (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm flares with elemental energy. Each creature in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on the greatwyrm must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (5d8) cold damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 20

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

actions.name: Claw

actions.name: Singularity Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon creates a shining bead of gravitational force in its mouth, then releases the energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage, and its speed becomes 0 until the start of the dragon's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

monsters.name: Bone Knight (Marcus)
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Commander of Bones
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the knight can target one skeleton or zombie it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must obey the knight's commands until the knight dies or until the knight releases it as a bonus action. The knight can command up to six undead at a time this way.

traits.name: Master of the Pallid Banner
traits.desc: While within 60 feet of the knight, any undead ally of the knight has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight attacks twice with one of its weapons.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 4 (1d8 + 0) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Crimson Lucia
monsters.languages: Abyssal plus any one language (usually Common)

traits.name: Blood Witch Dance
traits.desc: Crimson Lucia can use a bonus action to control the movement of one creature cursed by her hex spell that she can see within 30 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or use its reaction to move up to 30 feet in a direction of Crimson Lucia's choice.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede Crimson Lucia's darkvision.

traits.name: Eternal Form (1/Month)
traits.desc: When Crimson Lucia is reduced to 0 hit points, she can choose to activate her Eternal Form instead of falling unconscious. When this ability is activated, Lucia changes statblock to Lucia The Ethernal and cast *circle of death*. This form lasts for 1 minute, after which Lucia get 3 levels of exhaustion.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Crimson Lucia makes two attacks: one with her blood blade and one with her blood lash.

actions.name: Blood Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Blood Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Crimson Lucia regains hit points equal to that amount.

spells: Crimson Lucia's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, detect magic, eldritch blast (at 7th level), false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only)

spells.2/day each: hellish rebuke, hex, scorching ray (at 1st level)

monsters.name: Lucia The Eternal

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If Lucia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Blood Witch Dance
traits.desc: Lucia can use a bonus action to control the movement of one creature cursed by her hex spell that she can see within 30 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or use its reaction to move up to 30 feet in a direction of Lucia's choice.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede Lucia's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Lucia makes two attacks: one with her blood blade and one with her blood lash.

actions.name: Blood Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or lose 5 (1d10) additional hit points as blood drains from its body.

actions.name: Blood Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Lucia regains hit points equal to that amount.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) force damage.

reactions.desc: When a creature Lucia can see makes an attack roll against her, she can use her reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Blood Strike
legendary_actions.desc: Lucia makes a Blood Blade or Blood Lash attack.

legendary_actions.name: Maddening Hex (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Lucia causes a creature cursed by her hex spell to take 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

legendary_actions.desc: Lucia teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space she can see, leaving behind a trail of blood. Any creature within 5 feet of her original position must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Sora Maenya

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Sora Maenya fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Maenya's Might
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Sora Maenya can empower her next attack, doubling the damage dealt. This effect ends after she makes an attack or at the end of her turn.

traits.name: Unstoppable Rage
traits.desc: Sora Maenya gains additional temporary hit points equal to half the damage she takes. She can use this temporary hit point pool to bolster her attacks, increasing their damage by the amount of remaining temporary hit points.

actions.desc: Sora Maenya makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her fists.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Crushing Grasp (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Sora Maenya grabs a creature within reach, dealing 40 (6d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or become restrained until the end of Maenya's next turn.

spells: Sora Maenya is an 8th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks).

legendary_actions.name: Intimidating Roar
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature of Sora Maenya’s choice within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Fist Smash

monsters.name: Sora Katra
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Sora Katra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Heart's Bargain
traits.desc: Sora Katra can offer an ally advantage on one roll at the cost of disadvantaging their next roll, reflecting her ability to tempt others.

traits.name: Mind Maze
traits.desc: Once per turn, when Sora Katra hits a creature with a melee or spell attack, she can force it into a mind maze (DC 20 Wisdom saving throw). On a failure, the creature becomes paralyzed until the end of its next turn as it tries to escape the illusion.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Sora Katra makes two attacks with her dagger or casts one spell.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Beguiling Gaze
actions.desc: Sora Katra fixes her gaze on a creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. While charmed, the creature regards Sora Katra as a trusted friend. This charm ends if Sora Katra or her allies harm the creature.

spells: Sora Katra is a 15th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 22, +14 to hit with spell attacks).

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, disguise self, dissonant whispers

spells.7th level (1 slot): resurrection, finger of death, project image

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: Sora Katra casts one of her spells.

legendary_actions.name: Misleading Mirage
legendary_actions.desc: Sora Katra creates an illusory double of herself within 60 feet. The double lasts until the start of her next turn or until it is attacked, and it can mimic her movements.

legendary_actions.name: Vanish (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Sora Katra becomes invisible until the end of her next turn or until she attacks or casts a spell.
